CustomField.description:
-Time Management: Ability to multi-task & be able to handle multiple assignments. Focusing on being organised & attention to details in a timely manner.
-Process Improvement: Constant review of process workflow and internal check & control. Able to propose creative and innovative ideas to streamline the way tasks/jobs are executed.
-Consistency: for classification of information in the report -Cost management: Improve cost control -Error & Fraud detection
CustomField.inlineHelpText:
-Time Management: Ability to multi-task & be able to handle multiple assignments. Focusing on being organized & attention to detail in a timely manner.
-Process Improvement: Constant review of process workflow and internal check & control. Able to propose creative and innovative ideas to streamline the way tasks/jobs are executed.
-Consistency: for classification of information in the report -Cost management: Improve cost control -Error & Fraud detection
CustomField.label: Industry Best Practices (FIN)
